Detailed Description

===========================================================================

Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_mstTogForceTimeout ( uintptr_t  baseAddr)

Force a timeout.

This function enables software to force a timeout and flush of the interface transactions.

Parameters
baseAddr[IN] The address of the desired VBUSM Master Timeout Gasket Control register
Returns
CSL_PASS Function completed successfully CSL_EFAIL Timeout function is disabled. Call CSL_mstTogStart first.
void CSL_mstTogReset ( uintptr_t  baseAddr)

Reset the timeout functionality.

This function resets the timeout functionality by clearing the timeout interrupt and timeout counter. It should be called after servicing a timeout interrupt and before re-enabling the timeout counter via the CSL_mstTogStart function.

Note that the timeout value set via the CSL_mstTogSetTimeoutVal function is unaffected.

Parameters
baseAddr[IN] The address of the desired VBUSM Master Timeout Gasket Control register
Returns
None
int32_t CSL_mstTogSetTimeoutVal ( uintptr_t  baseAddr,
CSL_MstTogVal  timeoutVal 
)

Set the timeout value.

This function sets the desired timeout value. This function should only be called when the timeout is disabled.

Parameters
baseAddr[IN] The address of the desired VBUSM Master Timeout Gasket Control register
timeoutVal[IN] Timeout count value. See #CSL_MstTogVal for a list of valid timeout values.
Returns
CSL_PASS Function completed successfully CSL_EFAIL Timeout value cannot be set when the timeout counter is running. Call CSL_mstTogReset first.
void CSL_mstTogStart ( uintptr_t  baseAddr)

Start the timeout function.

This function starts the timeout counter functionality.

Parameters
baseAddr[IN] The address of the desired VBUSM Master Timeout Gasket Control register
Returns
None
void CSL_mstTogStop ( uintptr_t  baseAddr)

Stop the timeout function.

This function stops the timeout counter functionality.

Parameters
baseAddr[IN] The address of the desired VBUSM Master Timeout Gasket Control register
Returns
None
